title: Appropriate Biological Standardisation to Bring Confidence to Omics Data: The Example of the Microbiome
details: M Lamaudiere, C Sergaki - Food Science and Nutrition Cases, 2024
abstract: Research into the microbiome can provide invaluable information which is being increasingly used to improve knowledge on its fundamental influence over human health, and crucially, its potential to aid diagnostic and therapeutic efforts. However …
